item.title: Israel-Hezbollah ceasefire expected to halt war in Lebanon within hours
item.description: Israel and the Iran-backed group Hezbollah have apparently reached an agreement to end their year-long war in Lebanon.

item.title: The debate over parenting and independence
item.description: Psychologist David Friedlander of the Child Mind Institute discusses how parents can balance children's independence with safety concerns.
